rows.label: qst702405_msg0002
rows.name:
Say again? The militia's
short on people so you're
looking for volunteers?

rows.label: qst702405_msg0003
rows.name:
I gotcha. I'll go enlist
right now. ...Is that how
you thought this'd go?

rows.label: qst702405_msg0004
rows.name: A militia is basically an army.

rows.label: qst702405_msg0005
rows.name:
What that means, is that you're always
expected to fight. I don't really want
ties with that kind of organization again.

rows.label: qst702405_msg0006
rows.name:
But...if I flat-out refused, it'd
hurt my reputation, wouldn't it?

rows.label: qst702405_msg0007
rows.name:
All right then. I promise
to think it over. Just
don't get your hopes up.

rows.label: qst702405_msg0101
rows.name:
Sorry to disappoint you, after
you've come to ask me specifically.

rows.label: qst702405_msg0102
rows.name:
You know if it was anything else,
I'd do it and I'd do it for free.
But this of all things...

rows.label: qst702405_msg0103
rows.name: I'll need time to think about it.
